possibilities_a.title: Making data accessible
possibilities_a.body_1: Automate mortgage processing for 30% of the secondary market, for faster, lower-cost decisions
possibilities_a.body_2: Make wills and tax forms available digitally, making vital information accessible
possibilities_a.body_3: Digitize blueprints for aerospace manufacturing companies, accelerating innovation for future designs

possibilities_b.title: Unlocking new value streams
possibilities_b.body_1: Transform lab samples to train AI models, creating new revenue streams for healthcare providers
possibilities_b.body_2: Create buzzworthy content from extensive film archives, engaging new audiences for major studios
possibilities_b.body_3: Preserve, restore, and digitize cultural collections, enabling greater access and revenue sources

possibilities_c.title: Optimizing your assets
possibilities_c.body_1: Automate retention across physical and digital formats to optimize storage and reduce compliance risks
possibilities_c.body_2: Manage, remarket, and recycle IT devices, de-risking assets for organizations with a global workforce
possibilities_c.body_3: Process over 45 million kg of e-waste annually, making the IT lifecycle more sustainable

problem_2.title: < 1%
problem_2.subtitle: of enterprise data is leveraged for AI

challenge_1.title: Too much complexity
challenge_1.body: 1,300 exabytes of enterprise data created daily—scattered across systems and formats

challenge_2.title: Cost, uncertain ROI
challenge_2.body: 3+ years of ROI expected for AI efforts by ~50% of business leaders

challenge_4.title: Too few skills
challenge_4.body: Talent gaps are the third-largest barrier to getting AI ready

mapLocation_1.title: Secure chain of custody
mapLocation_1.body: Enhanced with certifications, including GDPR, SOC 2 Type II, ISO, HIPAA, and FedRamp.

mapLocation_2.title: World-class data sanitization
mapLocation_2.body: Ensures your data is protected, along with onsite and offsite destruction for all media types.

mapLocation_3.title: Museum-grade security
mapLocation_3.body: Secure content with a digital preservation platform purpose-built for rich media workflows.

mapLocation_2.title: Deploy IT assets at any moment
mapLocation_2.body: Incorporates asset receiving, tagging, tracking, and storage.

mapLocation_3.title: Digitize, organize, and access assets
mapLocation_3.body: Archival-quality imaging, digitization, and restoration transform media and connect with audiences of all types.

mapLocation_1.title: Discover new efficiencies through Intelligent Business Process Management (iBPM)
mapLocation_1.body: Find new ways forward in document driven processes.

mapLocation_2.title: Generate new revenue streams with Asset Monetization Platform (AMP)
mapLocation_2.body: Innovative tokenization and blockchain technology to authenticate and verify access rights, while being able to monetize more content.

mapLocation_3.title: Maximize value recovery and lower TCO
mapLocation_3.body: Uses primary and secondary resale paths for retired IT assets.

futurescaping_1.title: Protect
futurescaping_1.body: How can you safeguard and preserve your most valuable assets?

futurescaping_2.title: Connect
futurescaping_2.body: How can you prepare, integrate, and optimize data and assets across your organization?

futurescaping_3.title: Activate
futurescaping_3.body: What if every archived asset has revenue streams?

ambient.headline: The GRAMMY MuseumⓇ preserves the soundtrack of history.
ambient.subheader: "It’s been a pleasure working with Iron Mountain. We feel very confident that the GRAMMY Museum’s physical artifacts and digital content are safely protected. Iron Mountain’s digital preservation platform also provides significant reassurance that our iconic artist performances and interviews will remain preserved and accessible, which is a huge benefit to the GRAMMY Museum.”
ambient.attribution: - Michael Rohrabacher,  Technical Director at the GRAMMY Museum

ambient.headline: A global healthcare company mitigates risk and saves millions by finding certainty and clarity in its pension administration.
ambient.subheader: Our digital solutions centralized this healthcare organization's unstructured "dark data." This enterprise-wide visibility prevented erroneous pension payments, elevated records management, and created a searchable, compliant digital core for ongoing operational improvement.

ambient.body: A global healthcare company optimizes IT asset management, improves transparency, and boosts remarketing returns by partnering with Iron Mountain Asset Lifecycle Management.
